scripts.build:ipfs:rinkeby: yarn && yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph build --ipfs https://testnet.thegraph.com/ipfs/
scripts.build:ipfs:mainnet: yarn && yarn prepare:mainnet && graph build --ipfs https://ipfs.network.thegraph.com
scripts.deploy-mainnet-staging: yarn && yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy graphprotocol/graph-network-analytics-staging --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-mainnet: yarn && yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy graphprotocol/graph-network-analytics --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-arbitrum: yarn && yarn prepare:arbitrum && graph deploy graphprotocol/graph-analytics-arbitrum --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-sepolia: yarn && yarn prepare:sepolia && graph deploy graphprotocol/graph-analytics-sepolia --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-arbitrum-sepolia: yarn && yarn prepare:arbitrum-sepolia && graph deploy graphprotocol/graph-analytics-arb-sepolia --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-testing: yarn && yarn prepare:<environment> && graph deploy <subgraph-name> --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-studio-mainnet: yarn && yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy --studio graph-analytics-ethereum
scripts.deploy-studio-arbitrum: yarn && yarn prepare:arbitrum && graph deploy --studio graph-analytics-arbitrum
scripts.deploy-studio-sepolia: yarn && yarn prepare:sepolia && graph deploy --studio graph-analytics-sepolia
scripts.deploy-studio-arbitrum-sepolia: yarn && yarn prepare:arbitrum-sepolia && graph deploy --studio graph-analytics-arb-sepolia
scripts.deploy-studio: yarn deploy-studio-mainnet && yarn deploy-studio-arbitrum && yarn deploy-studio-sepolia && yarn deploy-studio-arbitrum-sepolia
scripts.prepare:mainnet: yarn prep:addresses:mainnet && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.prepare:arbitrum: yarn prep:addresses:arbitrum && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.prepare:arbitrum-sepolia: yarn prep:addresses:arbitrum-sepolia && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.prepare:sepolia: yarn prep:addresses:sepolia && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
